tier.item: (1) Ti si mu gi dal.
you aux.2SG him. them. gave
DAT ACC
`You gave him them.'
(1) Ti si mu gi dal.
you aux.2SG him. DAT them. ACC gave
`You gave him them.'
Ti si mu gi dal.
you aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC gave
You gave him them.
(3) a. Vcera si mu gi pokazvala.
yesterday aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC shown.FEM
`You have shown him them yest erday.'
(3) a. Vcera si mu gi pokazvala.
yesterday aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC shown.FEM
`You have shown him them yest erday.'

yesterday aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC shown.FEM
You have shown him them yest erday.
b. Pokazvala si mu gi.
shown.FEM aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC
`You have shown him them.'
b. Pokazvala si mu gi.
shown.FEM aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC
`You have shown him them.'
Pokazvala si mu gi.
shown.FEM aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC
You have shown him them.
c. Pokazvala mu gi e.
shown.FEM him.DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
`She has shown him them.'
c. Pokazvala mu gi e.
shown.FEM him.DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
`She has shown him them.'
Pokazvala mu gi e.
shown.FEM him.DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
She has shown him them.
(6) Ivana bese procela knigata.
Ivana had.3SG read.FEM book.DE F
`Ivana had read the book.'
(6) Ivana bese procela knigata.
Ivana had.3SG read.FEM book.DE F
`Ivana had read the book.'

Ivana had.3SG read.FEM book.DE F
Ivana had read the book.
(7) a. Ivana bese vece procela knigata.
Ivana had.3SG already read.FEM book.DE F
`Ivana had already read the book.'
(7) a. Ivana bese vece procela knigata.
Ivana had.3SG already read.FEM book.DE F
`Ivana had already read the book.'

Ivana had.3SG already read.FEM book.DE F
Ivana had already read the book.
b. Kakvo bese Ivan procel?
what had .3SG Ivan read.MASC
`What had Ivan read?'
b. Kakvo bese Ivan procel?
what had .3SG Ivan read.MASC
`What had Ivan read?'
Kakvo bese Ivan procel?
what had.3SG Ivan read.MASC
What had Ivan read?
(8) Bese mu ja procela.
had.3SG him.DAT it.ACC read.FEM
`She had read it to him.'
(8) Bese mu ja procela.
had.3SG him.DAT it.ACC read.FEM
`She had read it to him.'
Bese mu ja procela.
had.3SG him.DAT it.ACC read.FEM
She had read it to him.
(9) Procela bese knigata.
read.FEM had.3SG book.DE F
`She had READ the book.'
(9) Procela bese knigata.
read.FEM had.3SG book.DE F
`She had READ the book.'
Procela bese knigata.
read.FEM had.3SG book.DE F
She had READ the book.
(10) a. Bese opredeleno procela knigata.
had.3SG definitely read.FEM book.DEF
`She had definitely read the book.'
(10) a. Bese opredeleno procela knigata.
had.3SG definitely read.FEM book.DEF
`She had definitely read the book.'
Bese opredeleno procela knigata.
had.3SG definitely read.FEM book.DEF
She had definitely read the book.
b. Procela (*opredeleno) bese (opredeleno) knigata.
read.FEM definitely had.3SG definitely book.DE F
`She had definitely READ the book.'

read.FEM definitely had.3SG definitely book.DE F
`She had definitely READ the book.'

read.FEM definitely had.3SG definitely book.DE F

(11) a. Bese li Marija kupila kâsta?
had.3SG Q Maria bought.FEM house
`Had Maria bought a house?'
(11) a. Bese li Marija kupila kâsta?
had.3SG Q Maria bought.FEM house
`Had Maria bought a house?'
Bese li Marija kupila kâsta?
had.3SG Q Maria bought.FEM house
Had Maria bought a house?
b. Kupila li (*Marija) bese (Marija) kâsta?
bought.FEM Q Maria had.3SG Maria house
`Had Maria BOUGHT a house?'
b. Kupila li (*Marija) bese (Marija) kâsta?
bought.FEM Q Maria had.3SG Maria house
`Had Maria BOUGHT a house?'
Kupila li (*Marija) bese (Marija) kâsta?
bought.FEM Q Maria had.3SG Maria house
Had Maria BOUGHT a house?
(12) a. Pokazvala li si mu gi?
showed.FEM Q aux.2SG him.DAT them. ACC
`Have you shown them to him?'
(12) a. Pokazvala li si mu gi?
showed.FEM Q aux.2SG him.DAT them. ACC
`Have you shown them to him?'
Pokazvala li si mu gi?
showed.FEM Q aux.2SG him.DAT them.ACC
Have you shown them to him?
b. Pokazvala li mu gi e?
showed.FEM Q him. DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
`Has she shown them to him?'
b. Pokazvala li mu gi e?
showed.FEM Q him. DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
`Has she shown them to him?'
Pokazvala li mu gi e?
showed.FEM Q him.DAT them.ACC aux.3SG
Has she shown them to him?
c. Ne mu li gi e pokazvala?
NEG him. DAT Q them.ACC aux.3S showed.FEM
G
`Hasn't she shown them to him?'
c. Ne mu li gi e pokazvala?
NEG him. DAT Q them.ACC aux.3S G showed.FEM
`Hasn't she shown them to him?'
Ne mu li gi e pokazvala?
NEG him.DAT Q them.ACC aux.3S G showed.FEM
Hasn't she shown them to him?
(14) Procela mu ja bese.
read.FEM him DAT it.ACC had.3SG
`She had READ it to him (and not sung it).' `She HAD read it to him.'
(14) Procela mu ja bese.
read.FEM him DAT it.ACC had.3SG
`She had READ it to him (and not sung it).' `She HAD read it to him.'
Procela mu ja bese.
read.FEM him DAT it.ACC had.3SG
She had READ it to him (and not sung it).
She HAD read it to him.
(17) ?Az sâm vece ti ja dala?!
I aux.1SG already you. it. given.
DAT ACC F EM
`I have already given it to you?!'
(17) ?Az sâm vece ti ja dala?!
I aux.1SG already you. DAT it. ACC given. F EM
`I have already given it to you?!'

I aux.1SG already you.DAT it.ACC given.F EM

given. aux.1 already you. it.ACC
F EM SG DAT
(18) *Dala sâm vece ti ja?!
given. F EM aux.1SG already you. DAT it.ACC
Dala sâm vece ti ja?!
given.F EM aux.1SG already you.DAT it.ACC
(19) a. Novata kola li prodade?
new.DEF car Foc sold.2/3SG
`Was it the new car that she/he/you sold?'
(19) a. Novata kola li prodade?
new.DEF car Foc sold.2/3SG
`Was it the new car that she/he/you sold?'

new.DEF car Foc sold.2/3SG
Was it the new car that she/he/you sold?
b. Sâvsem nova li roklja nosese?
completely new Foc dress wore.2/3SG
`Was it a completely new dress that she/he/you were wearing?
b. Sâvsem nova li roklja nosese?
completely new Foc dress wore.2/3SG
`Was it a completely new dress that she/he/you were wearing?
Sâvsem nova li roklja nosese?
completely new Foc dress wore.2/3SG

c. Koj kakvo li kupuva?
who what Foc buys.3SG
`(I wonder) who is buying what?
c. Koj kakvo li kupuva?
who what Foc buys.3SG
`(I wonder) who is buying what?

who what Foc buys.3SG

tier.item: ( i) Tja (vece) ti (*vece) ja (*vece) e (vece)
she already you.DAT already it. already aux.3 already
ACC SG
dala (vece).
given.FEM already
`She has already given it to you.'
( i) Tja (vece) ti (*vece) ja (*vece) e (vece)
she already you.DAT already it. ACC already aux.3 SG already
dala (vece).
given.FEM already
`She has already given it to you.'
Tja (vece) ti (*vece) ja (*vece) e (vece) dala (vece).
she already you.DAT already it.ACC already aux.3 SG already given.FEM already
She has already given it to you.
( i) Tova, koeto pravi nestata interesni, e, ce toj ...
that which makes things interest ing is that he
`That which makes things interesting is that he ...'

that which makes things interest ing is that he
`That which makes things interesting is that he ...'

that which makes things interest ing is that he

(20) a. Petko, edin moj prijatel, mi go dade.
Peter a my friend me.DAT him.ACC gave
`Petko, a friend of mine, gave it to me.'

b. Ako njakoj, kojto e s men, mi dade njakolko cipa ...
if someone who is with me me.DAT gives several chips
`If someone, who is with me, gives me some chips ...'

c. Ivan, spored Marija, go vizdam vseki den.
Ivan according Maria him.ACC see.1SG every day
`(Talking about) Ivan, according to Maria, I see him every day.'
c. Ivan, spored Marija, go vizdam vseki den.
Ivan according Maria him.ACC see.1SG every day

d. Sled kato si zivjal dosta s edna zena, ja poznavas mnogo dobre.
after as aux.2SG lived enough with a woman her.ACC know.2SG very well
`After you have lived with a woman enough, you know her very well.'
d. Sled kato si zivjal dosta s edna zena, ja poznavas mnogo dobre.
after as aux.2SG lived enough with a woman her.ACC know.2SG very well

after as aux.2SG lived enough with a woman her.ACC know.2SG very well

(24) Procela mu ja bese.
read.FEM him.DAT it.ACC had.3SG
`She had READ it to him (and not sung it).' `She HAD read it to him.'
OR

read.FEM him.DAT it.ACC had.3SG
`She had READ it to him (and not sung it).' OR `She HAD read it to him.'

read.FEM him.DAT it.ACC had.3SG
She had READ it to him (and not sung it).
She HAD read it to him.

they aux.3PL as that you. DAT said introduced refl.ACC Peter
`They, as I told you, introducedthemselves to Peter.'

SG

(40) a. Tja mu bila kazala vsicko.
she him.DAT ren.FEM told.FEM all
`(They say although I suspect its veracity, that) she had told him everything.'
